de.erichseifert.gral.plots.settings

Interface SettingsStorage

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AreaRenderer, AxisRenderer, Legend, LineRenderer, Plot, PointRenderer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAreaRenderer, AbstractAxisRenderer2D, AbstractLegend, AbstractLineRenderer2D, AbstractPlot, AbstractPointRenderer, BarPlot, BarPlot.BarPlotLegend, BarPlot.BarRenderer, BasicSettingsStorage, BoxPlot, BoxPlot.BoxPlotLegend, BoxPlot.BoxWhiskerRenderer, DefaultAreaRenderer2D, DefaultLineRenderer2D, DefaultPointRenderer2D, DiscreteLineRenderer2D, Label, LabelPointRenderer, LineAreaRenderer2D, LinearRenderer2D, LogarithmicRenderer2D, PiePlot, PiePlot.PiePlotArea2D, PiePlot.PiePlotLegend, PiePlot.PieSliceRenderer, PlotArea, RasterPlot, RasterPlot.RasterRenderer, SeriesLegend, SizeablePointRenderer, SmoothLineRenderer2D, StylableContainer, StylableDrawable, ValueLegend, XYPlot, XYPlot.XYLegend, XYPlot.XYPlotArea2D

    public interface SettingsStorage
    Interface providing functions to store and retrieve settings for an object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T getSetting(Key key)
      Returns the setting with the specified key.
      <T> void removeSetting(Key key)
      Removes the setting with the specified key.
      <T> void removeSettingDefault(Key key)
      Removes the default setting with the specified key.
      <T> void setSetting(Key key, T value)
      Sets the setting with the specified key to the specified value.
      <T> void setSettingDefault(Key key, T value)
      Sets a default value for the setting with the specified key.

    • Method Detail

      • getSetting

        <T> T getSetting(Key key)
        Returns the setting with the specified key. If no setting is available, the default setting will be returned.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of setting.
        Parameters:
        key - Key.
        Returns:
        Setting.

      • setSetting

        <T> void setSetting(Key key,
                  T value)
        Sets the setting with the specified key to the specified value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of setting.
        Parameters:
        key - Key.
        value - Value to be set.

      • removeSetting

        <T> void removeSetting(Key key)
        Removes the setting with the specified key.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of setting.
        Parameters:
        key - Key.

      • setSettingDefault

        <T> void setSettingDefault(Key key,
                         T value)

        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of setting.
        Parameters:
        key - Key.
        value - Value to be set.
